article: It's a  _  day today. Jim's family  _  having a picnic  . They put a big cloth  on the ground.  _  it are some yellow bananas, red apples, orange oranges and some white eggs. The  _  in the white trousers is Mrs. Green. She is thirty-five. She is  _  English teacher in No. 12 Middle School. She is sitting on the cloth. The man is  _  father. He is forty. His shirt is black and his trousers  _  yellow. He is a teacher, too. But he teaches in a No. 18 Middle School. He is  eating  an apple. They have a black car. It is under a tree.  _  that boy? That's Jim. He is drinking. His shirt is green. The girl near  _  is his sister, Kate. She is in a red dress today. What is she doing? She is reading a magazine  . They are having a great time.
